    • initmovlist

      public static void initmovlist(Date clock)
      Utility function to initialise the movieList ArrayList
      Parameters:
      clock - clock for checking if some movies are still screening

    • updateMovieList

      private static void updateMovieList(Movie mov)
      Utility function to update movieList with updated metadata for Movie mov
      Parameters:
      mov - Movie which information is to be updated

    • updateFiles

      public static void updateFiles()
      Utility function to write data to text files in movie database

    • createMovie

      public static Movie createMovie()
      Creates a new movie by reading metadata from user input If new movie already exists, provides option to overwrite data or abort the process
      Returns:
      Newly created Movie object

    • getMovieByTitle

      public static Movie getMovieByTitle(String Title)
      Retrieves most updated image of the Movie object with the same title as the input String
      Parameters:
      Title - Desired movie's title
      Returns:
      Desired movie if found, else null

    • updateMovieAdmin

      public static void updateMovieAdmin(String title)
      Updating movie details not related to administrative metadata
      Parameters:
      title - Title of the movie to be updated

    • updateMovieEndDate

      public static void updateMovieEndDate(String title, Date end)
      Updates selected movie's end date
      Parameters:
      title - Required movie' title
      end - New end date

    • setEndDate

      public static void setEndDate(String title)
      Extends movie end date End date cannot be shortened as it may clash with screenings
      Parameters:
      title - Title of movie to be edited

    • updateMovieReviews

      public static String updateMovieReviews(String tixId, String title)
      Updates the review of the desired movie associated with a ticket ID
      Parameters:
      tixId - Ticket ID of user
      title - Movie title whose review to be edited
      Returns:
      Updated rating and review

    • incMovieCounter

      public static void incMovieCounter(String title)
      Increment cineplex counter of a movie
      Parameters:
      title - Title of movie to increment counter of

      public static void decMovieCounter(String title)
      Decrement cineplex counter of a movie
      Parameters:
      title - Title of movie to decrement counter of

    • incTicketSales

      public static void incTicketSales(String title)
      Increment ticket sales of a movie
      Parameters:
      title - Title of movie to increment ticket sales of

    • setNowShowing

      public static void setNowShowing(String title)
      Sets movie status from PREVIEW to NOW_SHOWING
      Parameters:
      title - Title of movie to be edited

    • setStatus

      public static void setStatus(String title, Status newStatus)
      Sets movie's status, subject to logical constraints A movie that is not showing cannot be PREVIEW or NOW_SHOWING A movie that is showing cannot be COMING_SOON or END_OF_SHOWING
      Parameters:
      title - Title of movie to be edited
      newStatus - New status to switch to

    • titleExists

      public static boolean titleExists(String Title)
      Check if movie of given title exists
      Parameters:
      Title - Movie title to check
      Returns:
      true if exists, else false

      Sorted array
